source.48525af4: As you can see in the chart, all products got blocked simultaneously. YouTube got blocked shortly before the shutdown. The data for some products is noisy.
source.75f71385:
# Internet Shutdown in Uganda

This notebook shows the internet shutdown in Uganda on January 13, 2021, ahead of its elections.

The data is from the Google Transparency Report: https://transparencyreport.google.com/traffic/overview?fraction_traffic=start:1610236800000;product:19;region:UG&lu=fraction_traffic
source.1021302f:
## Tor Traffic
You can see that the Tor traffic spikes during the period of selective censorship, then there's no data for the period of complete shutdown.
